title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the opening night in the NBA and points out the biggest difference between a poorly run team in the Lakers and well run team in the Warriors. He believes it's time for the Packers to go all in on making Aaron Rodgers happy by trading for a star wide receiver. He also declares he's done blaming Russell Westbrook for all of the Lakers issues. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to make Colin answer for Russell Wilson's struggles since joining the Broncos. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
